languages.text: Вместо ответа на запрос связи судно дает залп и идет на сближение!
Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!
languages.original_text: Вместо ответа на запрос связи судно дает залп и идет на сближение!

traits.locale_text: Instead of responding to your contact request, the ship fires a salvo and starts approaching you!
Instead of responding to your contact request, the ship fires a salvo and starts approaching you!
Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course towards you!
Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!
Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!
Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!

languages.text: 这艘飞船并没有回应你的信息，而是朝你发射了一枚炮弹，随即朝你冲了过来！
languages.original_text: Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!

traits.locale_text: 这艘飞船并没有回应你的信息，而是朝你发射了一枚炮弹，随即朝你冲了过来！

languages.text: En lugar de responder a tu mensaje, ¡la nave dispara una andanada y traza un rumbo de intercepción!
languages.original_text: Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!

traits.locale_text: En lugar de responder a tu mensaje, ¡la nave dispara una andanada y traza un rumbo de intercepción!

languages.text: 船は呼びかけに応じるどころか、砲弾を発射し、こちらに進路を向けてきた！
languages.original_text: Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!

traits.locale_text: 船は呼びかけに応じるどころか、砲弾を発射し、こちらに進路を向けてきた！

languages.text: Statt auf deinen Ruf zu antworten, feuert das Schiff eine Salve ab und setzt Kurs auf dich!
languages.original_text: Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!

traits.locale_text: Statt auf deinen Ruf zu antworten, feuert das Schiff eine Salve ab und setzt Kurs auf dich!

languages.text: En guise de réponse à votre appel, le vaisseau tire une première salve et se dirige vers vous !
languages.original_text: Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!

traits.locale_text: En guise de réponse à votre appel, le vaisseau tire une première salve et se dirige vers vous !

languages.text: Korsan gemisi, çağrıya yanıt vermek yerine bir salvo ateşliyor ve doğrudan gemine doğru yol alıyor!
languages.original_text: Instead of responding to your hail, the ship fires a salvo and sets course toward you!
